    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Tax_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Tax_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Tax sequenceNbr="Example String Value" taxExcludedInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <AmountSummary description="Example String Value" percentage="10" quantity="1234" unitName="Example String Value" unitPrice="100.0000">
        <Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</Total>
        <ChargeUnit>Per unit</ChargeUnit>
    </AmountSummary>
    <EffectiveExpire effective="2011-01-24" expire="2011-07-04" expireDateExclusiveInd="true"/>
    <TaxType_Enum>Assessment/license tax</TaxType_Enum>
</Tax>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Tax" : {
    "sequenceNbr" : "Example String Value",
    "taxExcludedInd" : true,
    "AmountSummary" : {
      "unitPrice" : 100.0000,
      "unitName" : "Example String Value",
      "quantity" : 1234,
      "percentage" : 10,
      "description" : "Example String Value",
      "Total" : {
        "value" : 80000,
        "currencyCode" : "USD",
        "minorUnit" : 2
      },
      "ChargeUnit" : {
        "value" : "Per unit"
      }
    },
    "EffectiveExpire" : {
      "value" : null,
      "effective" : "2011-01-24",
      "expire" : "2011-07-04",
      "expireDateExclusiveInd" : true
    },
    "TaxType_Enum" : {
      "value" : "Assessment/license tax"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        AmountSummary
        The breakdown of the tax including either the amount or percent of the tax.
        Details
        Type Amount_Summary
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        EffectiveExpire
        Provides the effective and expiry dates for the tax.
        Details
        Type DateEffectiveExpire
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        TaxType_Enum
        Identifies the tax (eg. Sales Tax, State Tax)
        Details
        Type TaxType_Enum
        Example Value Assessment/license tax
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        sequenceNbr
        A number assigned by the responding system to designate the order of this tax among multiple taxes.
        Details
        Type String
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        taxExcludedInd
        When present and true, this tax is excluded.
